div.div: Univ. of St. Thomas vs. Saint John's Univ.

tr.td: UST wins the toss and defers, SJU will receive
Carter Schmitz kickoff 62 yards to the SJU03, Max Jackson return 22 yards to the SJU25 (Mark Dowdle; Adam Brant).
Saint John's Univ. drive start at 15:00.
Jackson Erdmann pass complete to Tommy Auger for 1 yard to the SJU26 (Isaac Seering).
Zack Sundly rush for no gain to the SJU26, fumble by Zack Sundly recovered by UST Ryan Winter at SJU26, fumble forced by Adam Brant.
Univ. of St. Thomas drive start at 14:09.
Tucker Trettel rush for no gain to the SJU26 (Nathan Brinker; Peyton Thiry).
Alex Fenske pass complete to Joe Reed for 24 yards to the SJU02 (L. Gutierrez).
Tucker Trettel rush for 1 yard to the SJU01 (Parker Anderson; Carter Hanson).

Alex Fenske rush for 5 yards to the SJU00, TOUCHDOWN, clock 11:31.
